dublin_core.dcvalue: Richard Lefty, CEO, MicroEnsure, Email: richard.leftley@microensure.com | Peter Gross, Regional Director Africa, Email: peter.gross@microensure.com

A health microinsurance that offers life insurance and hospital cash for hospital care and utilizes mobile-phone based claim payments in Dar es Salaam. Insurance premiums are deducted from the customer's airtime balance and claims are paid via mobile money payments in 3-4 days.
Made available in DSpace on 2020-10-14T10:20:02Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 1 pona_na_tigo_bima.pdf: 332269 bytes, checksum: 908cbd703a6db41f403641f8e878eb32 (MD5)
MicroEnsure, Tigo, Bima, Golden Crescent Assurance

Financial transactions and incentives, Child health, Family planning, HIV/AIDS, Infectious diseases, Malaria and other vector-borne diseases, Maternal health, Newborn health, Non-communicable diseases, Nutrition, Parasitic diseases, Primary Care, Sexual and reproductive health, Tuberculosis, Domestic violence, Water, sanitation, and hygiene
